name: plumed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
decorated with several large feathers tied together: The dancers wore plumed headdresses. The circus troop wore the gaudiest plumed costumes imaginable. See
plume
More examplesFewer examplesThe knights were dressed in colourful capes and plumed headgear.The king is the only one with a plumed helmet. Ten dancers in brilliantly colored native dress and large plumed headdresses danced up the main aisle.
